description: A new Pew study finds that adult Americans aren't just watching online videos, they're making them as well.
title: Study: Adults love online video, too
teaser: A new Pew study finds that adult Americans aren't just watching online videos, they're making them as well.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, October 10, 2013
contentencoded:
There's a Pew study out this morning that looks closely at online video. The main headline here is that the medium is growing, not only in terms of viewing but also people creating and posting online videos of all kinds. But the growth isn't coming from kids, it's coming from adults. Kristen Purcell is an associate research director at Pew's Internet Project, and tells Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson about the study's findings.

[[{"fid":"209721","view_mode":"default","type":"media","attributes":{"height":238,"width":238,"alt":"The Rise of Online Video","class":"media-element"}}]]
